name: FISTXFIST
description:
In the year 2025, you are Crystoph - a lone werewolf that has lost everything to the Ice-zis: mindless, heartless zombies that abruptly emerged under the control of King Paltryclaw. Your home, your family... and even your right arm.

So what can you do?
Break into King Paltryclaw's lab, SMASH the ice-zis, and defeat the dreaded goblin king once and for all!

WASD-Move
Mouse-Look
E-Interact
LMB-Swipe
RMB-Punch
Enter-Pause

mouse sensitivity can be adjusted somewhat with A and D when paused

by team VultureParty for GVN2018

postjam update - alternate control methods. jam version of webgl build @ http://rainbowcemetery.com/FISTXFIST_JAM/
